categories: Category:Phineas and Ferb: Star Wars voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Empire at War voice actors

nodes.text: Christopher Corey Smith (born July 12, 1962) is a voice actor who voiced multiple characters in the video game Star Wars: Empire at War, and Phineas and Ferb: Star Wars.
He's also know for voicing The Joker in many LEGO related projects.
